GSD.description:
ext4: make sure ext4_append() always allocates new block

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit b77dd5b2c5826ba517493319199e0c366ad22801. For more details please see the references link.
